articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: How coronavirus panic is making virus containment more difficult
articles.description: People are hoarding medical equipment, creating shortages, and making it challenging for health professionals to get the face masks and gloves they need for their work.

articles.author: Verne Kopytoff
articles.title: Apple extends store closures in China over coronavirus
articles.description: Apple is extending its retail store closures in China by a few days as the coronavirus continues to spread, potentially crimping sales in a critical region for longer than expected.

articles.author: David Meyer
articles.title: Coronavirus fears spread to European conferences
articles.description: As Ericsson and LG withdraw from major European tech conferences, events industry organizers warn of negative effects from coronavirus rumors.

articles.author: Grady McGregor
articles.title: Whistleblower doctor’s death stirs an online rebellion against China’s coronavirus response
articles.description: The doctor-turned-whistleblower died from the virus he was punished for warning about.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: China’s dream of overtaking Hollywood this year has been shattered by the coronavirus
articles.description: The coronavirus has clobbered the burgeoning Hollywood rival, virtually wiping out ticket sales during the recent seven-day Lunar New Year holiday.

articles.author: Alan Murray
articles.title: No time for optimism
articles.description: The U.S. stock market seems to be underestimating the impact of the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: Closed attractions, shut restaurants, and a ‘ban’ on hugs: How Disney parks are dealing with the coronavirus
articles.description: The business is vulnerable to the economic toll of the virus, which is at risk of spreading in big crowds.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: New coronavirus cases make Princess cruise ship the largest infection center outside China
